content => string (21742) "<ul class="wp-block-list"> <li>E-governance , e-democracy, MP online service...
$value['content']
<ul class="wp-block-list">
<li>E-governance , e-democracy, MP online services, UIDI & Aadhar
<div class="WaaZC">
<div class="rPeykc" data-hveid="CB0QAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQo_EKegQIHRAB"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153216">E-governance, or electronic governance, is <mark class="QVRyCf">the use of information and communication technologies (ICTs) to improve government services, information exchange, and overall governance processes</mark>. </span><span data-huuid="4477705171390155131">It aims to enhance efficiency, transparency, and citizen engagement in government operations.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="37849e5e-bb1c-4c33-8621-3b847e931f23"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="37849e5e-bb1c-4c33-8621-3b847e931f23" data-uuids="4477705171390153216,4477705171390155131">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CCEQAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegQIIRAB">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="WaaZC">
<div class="rPeykc pyPiTc" data-hveid="CBsQAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQo_EKegQIGxAB"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154865">Key aspects of e-governance:</span></div>
</div>
<div class="WaaZC">
<ul data-hveid="CCwQAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQm_YKegQILBAB">
<li class="K3KsMc">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156514"><strong>Delivery of government services:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154333">E-governance provides citizens and businesses with access to government services through online platforms, mobile applications, and other digital channels.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="37a4cfd1-6cf8-430a-8a73-c663680c856a"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="37a4cfd1-6cf8-430a-8a73-c663680c856a" data-uuids="4477705171390156514,4477705171390154333">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CCUQAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegQIJRAB">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="K3KsMc">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154067"><strong>Information exchange:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155982">It facilitates the sharing of information between government agencies, citizens, and businesses, promoting transparency and informed decision-making.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="597e81f1-e86c-47be-9989-1fb07dc77a32"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="597e81f1-e86c-47be-9989-1fb07dc77a32" data-uuids="4477705171390154067,4477705171390155982">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CCoQAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegQIKhAB">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
</ul>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__79" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155716"><strong>Communication transactions:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153535">E-governance enables online transactions, such as tax payments, registration of documents, and application for permits, streamlining administrative processes.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="1d58b959-22af-4e97-84f1-1cd6c5963f16"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="1d58b959-22af-4e97-84f1-1cd6c5963f16" data-uuids="4477705171390155716,4477705171390153535">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CJwBEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUInAEQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__87" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153269"><strong>Integration of systems:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155184">It involves the integration of various government systems and databases, enabling seamless data sharing and coordination across different departments.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="baaed0aa-f932-4140-8581-289686a32646"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="baaed0aa-f932-4140-8581-289686a32646" data-uuids="4477705171390153269,4477705171390155184">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CI8BEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUIjwEQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="WaaZC">
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__48" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="rPeykc pyPiTc" data-hveid="CH0QAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQo_EKegQIfRAB"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154918">Examples of e-governance initiatives:</span></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="WaaZC">
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__28" class="bsmXxe">
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__31" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156567"><strong>Online portals:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154386">Websites and platforms where citizens can access information, apply for services, and track the progress of their applications.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="48d881ff-3b80-40b6-a724-92e8b9e0cdf1"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="48d881ff-3b80-40b6-a724-92e8b9e0cdf1" data-uuids="4477705171390156567,4477705171390154386">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CMMBEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUIwwEQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__38" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154120"><strong>Mobile applications:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156035">Government services delivered through mobile devices, allowing citizens to access information and services on the go.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="b6ceb8ff-0197-46e2-a789-7bff91ffde2e"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="b6ceb8ff-0197-46e2-a789-7bff91ffde2e" data-uuids="4477705171390154120,4477705171390156035">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CPwBEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUI_AEQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__50" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155769"><strong>Digital payment systems:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153588">Online platforms for making payments to government agencies, such as tax payments, utility bills, and other fees.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="bbba689e-0006-45e5-9b61-ef15c7e50a3a"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="bbba689e-0006-45e5-9b61-ef15c7e50a3a" data-uuids="4477705171390155769,4477705171390153588">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CIkCEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUIiQIQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__67" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153322"><strong>Data management systems:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155237">Tools for collecting, storing, and analyzing data to improve decision-making and policy formulation.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="1c2546b2-57f2-4c4e-87c4-b79b1023823b"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="1c2546b2-57f2-4c4e-87c4-b79b1023823b" data-uuids="4477705171390153322,4477705171390155237">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CO0BEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUI7QEQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__76" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154971"><strong>E-procurement:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390152790">Online platforms for government procurement of goods and services, promoting transparency and efficiency.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="76bb560a-55dd-4cf2-b897-84160e975faa"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="76bb560a-55dd-4cf2-b897-84160e975faa" data-uuids="4477705171390154971,4477705171390152790">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CP8BEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUI_wEQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__82" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156620"><strong>Citizen engagement platforms:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154439">Online forums and social media channels where citizens can interact with government officials, provide feedback, and participate in decision-making processes.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="8844fb76-3e1f-4d65-afe5-f72c8f7e884c"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="8844fb76-3e1f-4d65-afe5-f72c8f7e884c" data-uuids="4477705171390156620,4477705171390154439">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CIgCEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUIiAIQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="WaaZC">
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__61" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="rPeykc pyPiTc" data-hveid="CH4QAQ" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQo_EKegQIfhAB"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154173">Benefits of e-governance:</span></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="WaaZC">
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__30" class="bsmXxe">
<div id="QJJ8aOfoPPL5seMP1NGxsAI__34" class="bsmXxe">
<div class="zMgcWd dSKvsb" data-il="">
<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155822"><strong>Increased efficiency:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153641">Streamlining processes and reducing paperwork, leading to faster service delivery and reduced costs.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="d778ed22-d63d-4460-aa02-69b26c7fb255"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="d778ed22-d63d-4460-aa02-69b26c7fb255" data-uuids="4477705171390155822,4477705171390153641">
<div class="BMebGe btku5b fCrZyc LwdV0e FR7ZSc qVhvac OJeuxf" tabindex="0" role="button" aria-label="View related links" data-hveid="CIECEAE" data-ved="2ahUKEwjniKH17MqOAxXyfGwGHdRoDCYQ3fYKegUIgQIQAQ">
<div class="niO4u">
<div class="kHtcsd"> </div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>

<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153375"><strong>Enhanced transparency:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155290">Providing citizens with easy access to information and making government operations more visible.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="ce3560bd-ead4-4037-bf37-04a2f9c79aea"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>

<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155024"><strong>Improved citizen engagement:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390152843">Enabling citizens to participate in governance through online platforms and feedback mechanisms.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="5bf87ad2-db18-4d83-85f4-d948d5e62029"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
<div class="NPrrbc" data-cid="5bf87ad2-db18-4d83-85f4-d948d5e62029" data-uuids="4477705171390155024,4477705171390152843">

<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156673"><strong>Reduced corruption:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154492">Minimizing opportunities for corruption by automating processes and reducing human interaction.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="595bb6b0-2f5c-4830-a3d1-1b15709f67de"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>

<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154226"><strong>Economic growth:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156141">Promoting business activity through online transactions and access to information.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="cd26f133-5a4e-4d05-b2dc-30009ab6213a"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>

<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390153428"><strong>Digital divide:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155343">Ensuring equal access to technology and internet connectivity for all citizens.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="742175a1-1e47-4bd4-86e5-bed2b9bb631d"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>

<div data-crb-p="">
<div class="xFTqob">
<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390155077"><strong>Security and privacy concerns:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390152896">Protecting sensitive data and ensuring the confidentiality of citizen information.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="04c6974c-038f-4777-920b-a8c90751150f"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>

<div class="Gur8Ad"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156726"><strong>Infrastructure limitations:</strong></span></div>
<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390154545">Ensuring reliable internet connectivity and availability of necessary hardware and software.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="e0757e3f-e87a-4c61-ae69-c4e65e0122c7"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>

<div class="vM0jzc"><span data-huuid="4477705171390156194">Overcoming resistance from government officials and citizens who are not familiar with technology.<span class="pjBG2e" data-cid="4c1891fa-7b04-42e9-b690-bfc88db23460"><span class="UV3uM"> </span></span></span>
